message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but $120 is a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to pay $85. Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $105.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $105 is still a bit out of my range.  I'm firm on my offer of $85.  If you're not able to meet me there, I'll need to go with another option.
I understand your position, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $98.
Alice, I appreciate you being flexible, but $98 is still a bit too high for me. I'm really only able to spend $85. If you're not able to come down to that, I'm going to have to go with John's offer.
